Uses of Package
com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext

    Package Description
    com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext  
  • Classes in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext used by com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext 
    Class and Description
    AbstractFieldText
    An abstract base-class that partially implements the FieldText interface using sensible defaults.
    BIAS
    Fieldtext specifier for the BIAS operator
    BIASVAL
    Fieldtext specifier for the BIASVAL operator
    EMPTY
    Fieldtext specifier for the EMPTY operator
    EQUAL
    Fieldtext specifier for the EQUAL operator
    EQUALALL
    Fieldtext specifier for the EQUALALL operator
    EXISTS
    Fieldtext specifier for the EXISTS operator
    FieldText
    Interface for representing IDOL FieldText expressions.
    FieldTextBuilder
    FieldTextBuilder allows for the building of complex fieldtext expressions from other fieldtext expressions or specifiers.
    GREATER
    Fieldtext specifier for the GREATER operator
    LESS
    Fieldtext specifier for the LESS operator
    MATCH
    Fieldtext specifier for the MATCH operator
    MATCHALL
    Fieldtext specifier for the MATCHALL operator
    MATCHRECURSE
    Fieldtext specifier for the MATCHRECURSE operator
    NOTEQUAL
    Fieldtext specifier for the NOTEQUAL operator
    NOTMATCH
    Fieldtext specifier for the NOTMATCH operator
    NOTSTRING
    Fieldtext specifier for the NOTSTRING operator
    NOTWILD
    Fieldtext specifier for the NOTWILD operator
    RANGE.Type 
    Specifier
    A class to represent a general fieldtext specifier of the form:
    STRING
    Fieldtext specifier for the STRING operator
    STRINGALL
    Fieldtext specifier for the STRINGALL operator
    WILD
    Fieldtext specifier for the WILD operator
